thread.title: Obama: Hillary Clinton email server a mistake
thread.title_full: Obama: Hillary Clinton email server a mistake

title: Obama: Hillary Clinton email server a mistake
text:
Obama: Hillary Clinton email server a... Obama: Hillary Clinton email server a mistake Next Story Prev Story 22 min ago Read more: USA Today 
President Obama called Hillary Clinton's use of a private server for official emails during her time as secretary of State a "mistake" in an interview on CBS's 60 Minutes Sunday, but said the political scandal around it has been "ginned up" by her Re Obama: Hillary Clinton email server a mistake President Obama called Hillary Clinton's use of a private server for official emails during her time as secretary of State a "mistake" in an interview on CBS's 60 Minutes Sunday, but said the political scandal around it has been "ginned up" by her Re Check out this story on USATODAY.com: http://usat.ly/1LqDpp0 Hillary Rodham Clinton's use of a private email server to conduct government business when she served as secretary of state was a mistake, but didn't endanger national security, said President Obama during an interview on Oct. 11, on CBS's "60 Minutes." Start the conversation, or Read more at USA Today.
